bwwExcerpt: Yet for all its many charms, "Catch Me If You Can" is not the thorough thrill that one might have hoped. The creators truncate the story as presented in the film. They keep probably the most memorable image in the film - DiCaprio escaping detection at the airport surrounded by beautiful women in Pan Am stewardess outfits - but make it part of a production number without the context or the suspense...the very things that held our interest in the film.
